uk.org.rozanski.oauth_demo.lib

Class HttpdUrlHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • uk.org.rozanski.oauth_demo.lib.HttpdUrlHandler
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.sun.net.httpserver.HttpHandler

    public class HttpdUrlHandler
extends Object
implements com.sun.net.httpserver.HttpHandler
    URL handler for the HTTP server.

    This class performs the necessary actions when the server receives a request.

      • handle

        public void handle(com.sun.net.httpserver.HttpExchange exchange)
            throws IOException
        Handle a GET request sent to the local HTTP server. (POSTs are ignored.)

        The method sends the appropriate HTTP headers and message body back to the browser.

        Specified by:
        handle in interface com.sun.net.httpserver.HttpHandler
        Parameters:
        exchange - contains the request URL
        Throws:
        IOException - if there is an error reading the file

      • getStatusAndResponse

        DropboxStatus getStatusAndResponse(String uriPath,
                                   String queryString)
                            throws IOException,
                                   MalformedURLException
        Processes a request sent to the HTTP server.

        This will be one of:

        HttpConfig.HOME_PAGE

        The method displays a home page (use this to test that the server is running ok)

        HttpConfig.FINISH_PAGE

        The user has been redirected here by the Dropbox website. The redirection URL includes the authorisation code which will be used to generate the Dropbox token. The method runs the finish step of the Dropbox redirect workflow by calling DropboxWorkflowRedirect.httpdHandleFinishAndSave().

        Parameters:
        uriPath - The URL sent to the HTTP server
        queryString - The query string in the URL
        Returns:
        a DropboxStatus containing the HTTP status code and other information
        Throws:
        IOException - if there is an error reading the file
        MalformedURLException - if a malformed URL is received
        See Also:
        DropboxStatus

      • makeAnchor

        private static String makeAnchor(String url,
                                 boolean newWindow)
        return an HTML anchor tag for the given URL
        Parameters:
        url - the URL in the tag
        newWindow - if true, open the link in a new browser window
        Returns:
        HTML anchor tag
